dialogue:
Speaker A: I heard you got the promotion! Congratulations!
Speaker B: Thank you so much! I've been working towards this for three years.
[TARGET] Speaker B: I'm absolutely thrilled - this is a dream come true!

Speaker A: Did you hear? They cancelled the concert we had tickets for.
Speaker B: What? We've been planning this for months!
[TARGET] Speaker B: I can't believe it. I'm so disappointed.

Speaker A: I'm sorry, but I have to tell you something. Your dog got out of the yard.
Speaker B: What happened? Is he okay?
Speaker A: We couldn't find him. He's been missing for two days.
[TARGET] Speaker B: Oh no... I don't know what I'll do if something happened to him.

Speaker A: You said you'd pick up the kids at 3!
Speaker B: I told you I had a meeting until 4.
Speaker A: No, you didn't! They waited at school for an hour!
[TARGET] Speaker B: This is ridiculous! You never listen to anything I say!

Speaker A: Guess what? I just got a call from the hospital.
Speaker B: And? What did they say?
Speaker A: All my tests came back negative. I'm completely healthy!
[TARGET] Speaker B: That's wonderful news! I've been so worried about you!

Speaker A: The restaurant we wanted to try just got shut down for health violations.
Speaker B: You're kidding! We almost went there last week.
[TARGET] Speaker B: Ugh, that's disgusting. I'm glad we didn't eat there.

Speaker A: I saw someone following me on my way home last night.
Speaker B: That's scary! Did you call the police?
Speaker A: They said they'd increase patrols, but I still have to walk home alone tonight.
[TARGET] Speaker A: I'm really nervous about going out after dark now.

Speaker A: Happy birthday! I got you something special.
Speaker B: You didn't have to do that!
[TARGET] Speaker B: Wait... is this... a puppy?! I can't believe it!
